alert.note: Alert for Lake; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:25AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Obion and east central Lake Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 825 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reelfoot Lake State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union City, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Troy, Obion, Clayton, Cloverdale, Hornbeak, Woodland Mills, Rives, Samburg, Glass, Shaffner, Roneys Store, Elbridge, Blue Bank, Jacksonville, Fremont, Spout Springs, Old Fremont and Gibbs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
